author: ETA PRIME
description:
In this video, we take a first look at the all-new Ayn Thor, one of the most unique handhelds to hit the scene. Powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, this dual-screen AMOLED gaming handheld feels like a modern-day Nintendo DS — but way more powerful.
We go over the design, specs, ergonomics, software, and dual-screen functionality that make the Thor stand out. From the bright 120 Hz AMOLED main display to the customizable lower screen UI, this thing is sleek, fast, and surprisingly lightweight.
We also cover emulation performance, including PSP, Wii U, and 3DS gameplay, and discuss how the dual-screen setup actually enhances the experience. Whether you’re into Android gaming, emulation, or just love new handheld tech — this might be one of the coolest designs yet.

Buy the AYN Thor Here: https://www.ayntec.com/products/ayn-thor

title: Ayn Thor Dual Screen Handheld – The Modern DS We’ve Been Waiting For!
